import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import Header from "../headers/header" import HeaderPages from "../headers/headerPages" import Footer from "../footer" import AdminMenu from "../../components/adminMenu" import contactIcon from "../../assets/icons/email-blue.svg" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import FormHelperText from '@material-ui/core/FormHelperText'; import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl'; const AdminHome = (props) => { const [headerTitle, setHeaderTitle] = useState("Administration") const [headerBreadcrumbs, setHeaderBreadcrumbs] = useState([{value: "Accueil", link:"/"}, {value:"Administration", link:"/admin"}, {value: "Utilisateurs", link:"/admin/users"}, {value: "Edition", link:null}]) return(

{setEmail(e.target.value)}} error={emailError} type="email" value={email}/> {emailErrorText} {setPassword(e.target.value)}} error={passwordError} type="password" value={password}/> {passwordErrorText} {setPhone(e.target.value)}} /> {phoneErrorText} {setAddress(e.target.value)}} /> {setZip(e.target.value)}} /> {setCity(e.target.value)}} />
) } export default AdminHome
